scripts.build: bun run build:mac && bun run build:ubuntu
scripts.build:mac: mkdir -p dist/mac dist/mac-arm && bun build --compile --minify src/cli.ts --outfile dist/mac/dotfiles && bun build --compile --minify src/cli.ts --outfile dist/mac-arm/dotfiles && cp config.json dist/mac/ && cp config.json dist/mac-arm/
scripts.build:ubuntu: mkdir -p dist/ubuntu dist/ubuntu-arm && bun build --compile --minify src/cli.ts --outfile dist/ubuntu/dotfiles && bun build --compile --minify src/cli.ts --outfile dist/ubuntu-arm/dotfiles && cp config.json dist/ubuntu/ && cp config.json dist/ubuntu-arm/
scripts.build:local: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --minify src/cli.ts --outfile dist/dotfiles && cp config.json dist/
